mapper.select: select count(*) from transact where store_name like #{storeDTO.store_name}||'%' and substr(trans_date,0,8) like #{trans_date}||'%'

SELECT B.* FROM (SELECT rownum as rnum, A.* FROM ( select transaction_code, trans_date, refund_yn, total_price, payment, store_name as "storeDTO.store_name" from transact where store_name like #{storeDTO.store_name}||'%' and substr(trans_date,0,8) like #{trans_date}||'%' order by 2 desc ) A ) B WHERE rnum between #{pageDTO.startNum} and #{pageDTO.endNum}

select a.transaction_code AS "transactDTO.transaction_code", a.product_code AS "productDTO.product_code", a.quantity, b.price AS "productDTO.price", c.event_code AS "eventDTO.event_code", c.event_name AS "eventDTO.event_name", c.discount_rate AS "eventDTO.discount_rate" from transact_detail a join product b on (a.product_code = b.product_code) join transact d on (d.transaction_code = a.transaction_code) left outer join event c on (a.event_code = c.event_code and a.product_code = c.product_code and c.store_name = d.store_name) where a.transaction_code= #{transaction_code}
